sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-drawer
      :title="title"
      :width="800"
      placement="right"
      :closable="false"
      @close="close"
      :visible="visible"
  >

    <a-spin :spinning="confirmLoading">
      <a-form :form="form">
      
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="主键id">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'iId', validatorRules.iId ]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="业务模块id">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'iBusModelId', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="业务类型名称">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入业务类型名称" v-decorator="['sName', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="详情页面id">
          <a-input-number v-decorator="[ 'iPageId', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="页面头部左侧传入参数">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入页面头部左侧传入参数" v-decorator="['sBusLeftParameter', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否插入机构">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否插入机构" v-decorator="['iIsUnit', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否插入部门">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否插入部门" v-decorator="['iIsDept', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="页面头部右侧传入参数">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入页面头部右侧传入参数" v-decorator="['sBusRightParameter', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否有编辑器(1、0)">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否有编辑器(1、0)" v-decorator="['iIsEditor', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否包含发送范围(1、0)">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否包含发送范围(1、0)" v-decorator="['iIsLimits', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否纳入全文检索(1、0)">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否纳入全文检索(1、0)" v-decorator="['iIsEs', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="是否是流程审批(1、0)">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入是否是流程审批(1、0)" v-decorator="['iIsProc', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="工作流配置id">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入工作流配置id" v-decorator="['iProcSetId', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="创建者">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入创建者" v-decorator="['sCreateBy', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="创建时间">
          <a-date-picker showTime format='YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss' v-decorator="[ 'dCreateTime', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="修改者">
          <a-input placeholder="请输入修改者" v-decorator="['sUpdateBy', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
        <a-form-item
          :labelCol="labelCol"
          :wrapperCol="wrapperCol"
          label="修改时间">
          <a-date-picker showTime format='YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss' v-decorator="[ 'dUpdateTime', {}]" />
        </a-form-item>
		
      </a-form>
    </a-spin>
    <a-button type="primary" @click="handleOk">确定</a-button>
    <a-button type="primary" @click="handleCancel">取消</a-button>
  </a-drawer>
</template>

<script>
  import { httpAction } from '@/api/manage'
  import pick from 'lodash.pick'
  import moment from "moment"

  export default {
    name: "BusFunctionModal",
    data () {
      return {
        title:"操作",
        visible: false,
        model: {},
        labelCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 5 },
        },
        wrapperCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 16 },
        },

        confirmLoading: false,
        form: this.$form.createForm(this),
        validatorRules:{
        iId:{rules: [{ required: true, message: '请输入主键id!' }]},
        },
        url: {
          add: "/oaBus/busFunction/add",
          edit: "/oaBus/busFunction/edit",
        },
      }
    },
    created () {
    },
    methods: {
      add () {
        this.edit({});
      },
      edit (record) {
        this.form.resetFields();
        this.model = Object.assign({}, record);
        this.visible = true;
        this.$nextTick(() => {
          this.form.setFieldsValue(pick(this.model,'iId','iBusModelId','sName','iPageId','sBusLeftParameter','iIsUnit','iIsDept','sBusRightParameter','iIsEditor','iIsLimits','iIsEs','iIsProc','iProcSetId','sCreateBy','sUpdateBy'))
		  //时间格式化
          this.form.setFieldsValue({dCreateTime:this.model.dCreateTime?moment(this.model.dCreateTime):null})
          this.form.setFieldsValue({dUpdateTime:this.model.dUpdateTime?moment(this.model.dUpdateTime):null})
        });

      },
      close () {
        this.$emit('close');
        this.visible = false;
      },
      handleOk () {
        const that = this;
        // 触发表单验证
        this.form.validateFields((err, values) => {
          if (!err) {
            that.confirmLoading = true;
            let httpurl = '';
            let method = '';
            if(!this.model.id){
              httpurl+=this.url.add;
              method = 'post';
            }else{
              httpurl+=this.url.edit;
               method = 'put';
            }
            let formData = Object.assign(this.model, values);
            //时间格式化
            formData.dCreateTime = formData.dCreateTime?formData.dCreateTime.format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'):null;
            formData.dUpdateTime = formData.dUpdateTime?formData.dUpdateTime.format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss'):null;
            
            console.log(formData)
            httpAction(httpurl,formData,method).then((res)=>{
              if(res.success){
                that.$message.success(res.message);
                that.$emit('ok');
              }else{
                that.$message.warning(res.message);
              }
            }).finally(() => {
              that.confirmLoading = false;
              that.close();
            })



          }
        })
      },
      handleCancel () {
        this.close()
      },


    }
  }
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
/** Button按钮间距 */
  .ant-btn {
    margin-left: 30px;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
    float: right;
  }
</style>
